org.genepattern.module
Class AnalysisUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.genepattern.module.AnalysisUtil

public class AnalysisUtil
extends java.lang.Object

A class containing static convenience methods for tasks that are frequently encountered when writing GenePattern modules

                                           java.lang.String pathname,
                                           DatasetCreator<?> creator)
Reads the data at the given pathname. The type of the returned object is determined by the creator argument. Prints a message to the standard error stream and terminates the currently running Java Virtual Machine if an error occurs.

Parameters:
pathname - The file pathname
parser - The data parser
creator - The data creator
Returns:
An object containing the data

checkDimensions

public static void checkDimensions(DefaultDataset data,
                                   ClassVector cv)
Checks to see that the number of columns in the given matrix are equal to the size of the given class vector. Prints a message to the standard error stream and terminates the currently running Java Virtual Machine if the dimensions do not agree.

Parameters:
data - The 2-dimensional matrix
cv - The class vector

writeCls

public static java.lang.String writeCls(ClassVector cv,
                                        java.lang.String pathname,
                                        boolean checkFileExtension)
Writes the given class vector to a file. Prints a message to the standard error stream and terminates the currently running Java Virtual Machine if an error occurs.

Parameters:
cv - The class vector
pathname - A pathname string
checkFileExtension - Whether the correct file extension will be added to the pathname if it is not present.
Returns:
The pathname that the data was saved to

write

public static java.lang.String write(Dataset data,
                                     java.lang.String formatName,
                                     java.lang.String pathname,
                                     boolean checkFileExtension)
Writes data to a file in the given format. The correct file extension will be added to the pathname if it is not present. If there is already a file present at the given pathname, its contents are discarded. Prints a message to the standard error stream and terminates the currently running Java Virtual Machine if an error occurs.

Parameters:
data - the data.
formatName - a String containing the informal name of a format (e.g., "res" or "gct".)
pathname - a pathname string
checkFileExtension - Whether the correct file extension will be added to the pathname if it is not present.
Returns:
The pathname that the data was saved to

getDatasetParser

public static DatasetParser getDatasetParser(java.lang.String pathname)
Gets an data parser that can read the document at the given pathname or null if no parser is found. Prints a message to the standard error stream and terminates the currently running Java Virtual Machine if no parser is found or an error occurs.

Parameters:
pathname - A pathname string
Returns:
The parser

getFileName

public static java.lang.String getFileName(java.lang.String pathname)
Gets the name of the file at the given pathname. Removes the axis prefix if necessary.

Parameters:
pathname - The pathname string
Returns:
The file name

Parameters:
pathname - The pathname string.
Returns:
The feature set array.

writeFeatureSetMatrix

public static void writeFeatureSetMatrix(FeatureSet[] sets,
                                         java.lang.String format,
                                         java.lang.String pathname)
* Writes the feature set array to the specified file. If there is already a file present at the given pathname, its contents are discarded. Prints a message to the standard error stream and terminates the currently running Java Virtual Machine if an error occurs.

Parameters:
sets - The feature set array.
format - The format to save the feature set array to.
pathname - The pathname string.
